item.title: Dress to Impress Codes (August 2024)
item.content:encoded:
https://www.ign.com/articles/dress-to-impress-codes

Redeem these DTI codes for free outfits, accessories, and more!

If you're looking for DTI codes, IGN's got you covered! In this article, you'll find a list of active and working Dress to Impress codes in August 2024 that you can redeem for free rewards and bonuses.

Dress to Impress is a popular dress-up Roblox experience where you put on your best outfits and walk the runway in a bid to become a top model on PC, console, and mobile devices.

Active Dress to Impress Codes (August 2024)

Here are all the active Dress to Impress codes in August 2024 and the rewards you get for redeeming them:

  • THEGAMES (must complete all three The Games quests): Blue mermaid set
  • KREEK: Bear hat
  • FASHION: Black and white dress
  • LANA: White shorts, shirt, and legwarmers
  • LANABOW: White bow
  • BELALASLAY: Black jacket with pink halter top
  • LALATUTU: White dress
  • IBELLASLAY: Red, green, and blonde hairstyle
  • M3RM4ID: Orange mermaid set
  • TEKKYOOZ: White handbag
  • M0T0PRINCESSWAV: Gold crown
  • LABOOTS: Black boots
  • ITSJUSTNICHOLAS: Black jacket
  • ASHLEYBUNNI: Bunny slippers
  • LEAHASHE: Sweatshirt and sweatpants
  • CHOOPIE10K: Pastel dress and lamb bag
  • KITTYUUHH: Black cat
  • C4LLMEHH4LEY: Puffy dress and bear headband
  • SUBM15CY: Necklace and makeup

Expired Dress to Impress Codes

Below, you'll find a list of expired DTI codes that no longer work as of August 2024:

  • EYELASHES

How to Redeem Dress to Impress Codes

To redeem Dress to Impress codes, follow the steps below to claim free rewards in DTI:

  1. Open Dress to Impress and click on the handbag icon on the right-hand side to open the DTI Codes menu.
  2. Enter your code in the "Type here..." field.
  3. Click the checkmark icon to redeem the code.

Why Isn't My Dress to Impress Code Working?

If the code you're trying to redeem in DTI isn't working, it's likely because of one of the two following reasons:

  • The Dress to Impress code is expired
  • There's a spelling mistake in the code

When inputting a Dress to Impress code in Roblox, make sure it's spelled correctly (for example, a capital I isn't a lowercase l and vice versa) and that there are no spaces before or after the code. If your DTI code still isn't working, it's more than likely expired.

How to Get More DTI Codes

To get more Dress to Impress codes, the best way is to join the DTI Discord server. While we check for new codes often, the quickest way to know about new Dress to Impress codes is to follow the Roblox experience's official Discord server.

Meg Koepp is a Guides Editor on the IGN Guides team, with a focus on trends. When she's not working, you can find her adventuring around Eorzea in Final Fantasy XIV or making miniatures.

item.title: Noblechairs Hero Black Edition Review: Custom Printed and Flawless
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/noblechairs-hero-black-edition-review/

In my experience, gaming chairs often come and go for one reason or another. Perhaps the lumbar support isn‚Äôt right, the seat base isn‚Äôt wide enough, or it develops too much wear or an irritating creak after a few weeks of heavy usage. That‚Äôs right, I‚Äôm a big gamer in more ways than one ‚Äì and that often reflects in the gaming chairs that I opt to use.

I‚Äôve been fortunate enough to review one of the best gaming chairs I‚Äôve ever sat on ‚Äì the Noblechairs Hero Black Edition. This sumptuous, sturdy seat is one of the finest elements of my setup; a reliable foundation that supports me for several hours a day.

In this Noblechairs Hero Black Edition review, I‚Äôm going to break down why it‚Äôs just so good.

What‚Äôs New About The Noblechairs Hero Black Edition?

Let me open this Noblechairs Hero Black Edition review by stressing that I‚Äôve got my hands on something really special ‚Äì a custom-printed seat. It‚Äôs a new service offered by Noblechairs, and it‚Äôs phenomenal. I simply posted my images and the team expertly applied them to the back of this wondrous chair. The result is a high-quality, long-lasting, and bright print that stands out nicely against the deep black of the hybrid leather.

That‚Äôs where we‚Äôll kick this off ‚Äì the leather.

The Noblechairs Hero Black Edition uses a unique cover made of vinyl and polyurethane. It‚Äôs soft to the touch, doesn‚Äôt make you sweat, and you won‚Äôt stick to it in even the warmest weather. It feels super durable, and it‚Äôs wrapped around a cold foam cushioning that doesn‚Äôt relent, even after hours of use. If you pair all that with the velour and memory foam cushions that come in the box, plus the borderline military-grade aluminium and solid steel frame, you‚Äôve got a seat that‚Äôs as comfortable as it is dependable ‚Äì even if you‚Äôre looking for the best gaming chair for large people.

Full Features of the Noblechairs Hero Black Edition

I cannot praise this chair enough. It‚Äôs wide enough to support a larger frame, and the ‚Äòracer‚Äô style back simply opens up to accept you and welcome you to your new home. The soft-topped armrests are 4D, which means you can adjust them to suit your exact needs, and the integrated lumbar support is adjustable to match the curvature of your spine.

It‚Äôs heavy and chunky as all hell, but that‚Äôs a good thing ‚Äì it‚Äôs indicative of the robustness of this chair. I previously owned a Noblechairs Hero Edition and it lasted me three years before I moved on to something else ‚Äì and even when I moved on, the chair was in near mint condition, aside from a little wear to the custom design (it was a Fallout-themed chair).

Let me stress again ‚Äì if you‚Äôre looking for a gaming chair for bigger people, you cannot sleep on the Noblechairs Hero Black Edition. It supports a maximum user weight of 330 lbs (150 kg) and everything from the gas lift mechanism to the levers that you use to adjust the chair just feel so solid and high quality.

Is The Noblechairs Hero Black Edition Worth It?

It‚Äôs time to wrap up this Noblechairs Hero Black Edition review.

Is this gaming chair worth the ¬£399.95 asking price (before shopping costs)?

Absolutely ‚Äì it‚Äôs without a doubt the best gaming chair I‚Äôve ever used. It‚Äôs supportive, soft, breathable, and most of all, it‚Äôs comfortable. It accommodates people of all sizes but is perhaps best suited to those with a larger frame, and the custom printing that Noblechairs offers means it‚Äôs one of the best chairs for esports players and teams.

It‚Äôs easy to assemble, simple to maintain, and you‚Äôre unlikely to need to repair it, even after months of use. It‚Äôs noble by name and noble by nature ‚Äì if you‚Äôre in the market for a new chair, consider the Noblechairs Hero Black Edition.

item.title: Activision bans over 65,000 Call of Duty: Warzone and Modern Warfare 3 cheaters
item.content:encoded:
https://www.eurogamer.net/activision-bans-over-65000-call-of-duty-warzone-and-modern-warfare-3-cheaters

Activision has banned over 65,000 players across Call of Duty: Warzone and Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3.

The bans rolled out in the last few hours, purging thousands of "cheating and boosting" players from both Ranked and non-Ranked play alike.

"The Ricochet Anti-Cheat team has now purged the Ranked Play leaderboards in both Call of Duty: Warzone and Modern Warfare 3, banning accounts for cheating and boosting," Team Ricochet ‚Äì the cheating enforcement team ‚Äì said.

"Team Ricochet has accelerated cheat vendor enforcements resulting in over 65,000 account bans across Ranked Play and non-Ranked modes in Warzone and MW3 this week.

"The team will continue to monitor and issue enforcements to anyone cheating or boosting in all game modes."

üõ°Ô∏è #MW3 #Warzone #TeamRICOCHET

The RICOCHET Anti-Cheat team has now purged the Ranked Play leaderboards in both Call of Duty: Warzone and #MWIII, banning accounts for cheating and boosting.#TeamRICOCHET has accelerated cheat vendor enforcements resulting in over 65,000 account‚Ä¶

‚Äî Call of Duty Updates (@CODUpdates) August 2, 2024

To see this content please enable targeting cookies.

If that sounds like a lot, it's not really, given the size of the Call of Duty playerbase. As one commenter said in reply to the tweet above, "65k accounts seems so small... I just feel like there's so much more‚Ä¶"

ICYMI, last year's Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 is now available on Xbox Game Pass.

Game Pass subscribers will have access to all Modern Warfare 3 modes, meaning its single-player campaign, multiplayer, and open-world Zombies. It's only the second Activision Blizzard title to hit Game Pass since Microsoft's $69bn acquisition of the company last year, with Diablo 4 having launched for the subscription service back in March. It's not the only announced Activision title for Game Pass, of course; this year's Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 will be available to subscribers when it arrives on 24th October.

Black Ops 6 is hosting a multiplayer open beta this September, with those eligible for early access (which includes Game Pass subcribers) able to hop in one week prior.

item.title: World Series of Warzone 2024: Schedule, Prize Pool, Teams, and More
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/world-series-of-warzone-schedule-prize/

The World Series of Warzone is set to descend upon the realm of Call of Duty once more this year, and it‚Äôs looking bigger than ever. This time around, the legendary battle royale-based tournament is headed to Las Vegas, Nevada. It has been a busy few months as teams have fought to qualify for the Global Finals, which is the event taking place in September, but now, each of the 40 teams is locked in and raring to go.

World Series of Warzone Schedule and Format

The World Series of Warzone will run from September 14 ‚Äì 15, making it quite a short tournament compared to other, similar events in the space. It might only be a rapid-fire competition, but it boasts a sizeable prize pool of $1 million. This prize pool is split accordingly:

  • $50,000 ‚Äì SOLOYOLO Tournament
  • $950,000 ‚Äì Trios Tournament

It‚Äôs quite a confusing format for the World Series of Warzone, though.

Players will compete on the first day of the Global Finals in six matches, their placement in which will determine their seeding for the second day (or ‚Äòpoint advantage‚Äô). On day two, the teams will face off in an intense showdown with a ‚Äòmatch point‚Äô format. That means that once a team reaches 100 points (there are no match limits), they‚Äôll need to win one more match to secure the grand prize.

That means that you could theoretically have ten teams over 100 points and sitting on ‚Äòmatch point‚Äô, but it‚Äôs that final win that decides who takes home the trophy.

There‚Äôs a $300,000 prize reserved for the number one team.

World Series of Warzone Teams

There‚Äôs a pretty insane list of competitors making their way into the arena for the World Series of Warzone Global Finals. Here‚Äôs the full breakdown of the 40 squads fighting for the top spot:

  • Aydan, DjMas, zSmit
  • GabeKuun, Flanked, Blazt
  • Natedogg, Rxul, Destroy
  • iVisionSR, KingAJ, V8 Showstoppxr
  • Prxdigy, Oekiy, Echo
  • Niasen, KingChawk, NydaahSavage
  • LilMario, Lonnerdd, Clowhn
  • Colony2k, WatchWaldo, TBC
  • ZaaKK, HalloW, Ayzen
  • ZDark, Amir, Castillo
  • Biffle, Soka, Shifty
  • HusKerrs, Braalik, Jackal
  • Ottereyes, Empathy, SuperEvan
  • LouiCM, WarsZ, Bubblect
  • Begsy, SV, Reload
  • Stewo, Enxiun, Patzukka
  • Slide, BeamArk, Jtecc
  • RobStar, Wartex, Blade
  • Roocket, Qlapr, Zachar
  • Padrin, vitiin911, Reaper
  • Braxtvn, Yungstaz, JujuSaiyan
  • Braxtvn, Yungstaz, JujuSaiyan
  • Sage, Adrian, Swagg
  • Crmz, Xink7, HMoodX
  • Klavsen, ilgooy, FLS
  • SavyUltras90, isFreddy, Dsyre Zanx
  • Babahuf, FutureHasGame, AlmightyTJM
  • Boogs, Benzei, Stukex
  • Vxlcom, Resolve, PandaTv
  • iErickziN, Tabacudo, n4noFPS
  • Dongy, UnRational, ScummN
  • Levi, Lymax, Zepa
  • Strixy, Tapvaltor, Jonnybro23
  • iHeedz, Gromalok, Enkeo
  • Melvin, cPentagon, Fuzzn
  • Javiix, Dagat1, Camz
  • E700, Fundsy, Tea
  • Jukeyz, Lenun, Fifakill
  • Netodz, XtraJ, Vitaah
  • xmq, Hassi, Tikqs

I warned you ‚Äì it‚Äôs a massive list of Warzone competitors.

World Series of Warzone Predictions

Last year‚Äôs tournament win went to Biffle, Shifty, and Sage, and this year, everyone is holding out hope that the majority of that squad can pick up the two-time, back-to-back win. This time around, Sage has slipped in with Swagg, and Biffle and Shifty have picked up Soka, a Polynesian player who wound up sitting in second place last time around.

My money is on Team Biffle ‚Äì this crew breezed through the Warzone category at the Esports World Cup. If the team can win big at the World Series of Warzone, they‚Äôll be catapulted into the history books as some of the biggest earners in Call of Duty esports history.

item.title: Modern Warfare 3 Esports World Cup: Schedule, Prizes, Format And More
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/modern-warfare-3-esports-world-cup-schedule-prizing-format-and-more/

Are you excited about the Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 Esports World Cup tournament? The 2024 event is set to be held in August in Saudi Arabia, where many other games will also be hosting World Cup tournaments.

Here is everything you need to know about the Modern Warfare 3 Esports World Cup event, including the schedule, prizes, format and more.

Modern Warfare 3 Esports World Cup Schedule

With many different esports events happening in Saudi Arabia at the moment for the Esports World Cup, Modern Warfare 3 is just one of the games sharing the spotlight. Still, though, the popular title has quite a few fans excited for the competition.

Official Dates:

  • August 15
  • August 16
  • August 17
  • August 18

Each day of competition is expected to last around five to seven hours.

The Semi-Finals and Finals will both take place on Sunday, August 18 at 10 AM EST.

Prizing

The tournament will split a $1,800,000 prize pool amongst the 16 teams competing.

Official Prize Pool:

  • 1st: $600,000
  • 2nd: $320,000
  • 3rd-4th: $160,000
  • 5th-8th: $80,000
  • 9th-12th: $40,000
  • 13th-16th: $20,000

Every team competing walks home with money. Even the last-place team will still receive $20,000 in prizes.

Related: Valorant Champions 2024: Event Prizing, Schedule And Format

Every Team Competing In The Modern Warfare 3 Esports World Cup:

  • OpTic Gaming
  • Cloud 9
  • Toronto Ultra
  • 100 Thieves
  • Atlanta FaZe
  • Team Heretics
  • Seattle Surge
  • Las Vegas Legion
  • Carolina Royale Ravens
  • G2 Esports
  • Boston Breach
  • Lore Gaming
  • Stallions
  • Gentle Mates
  • OMiT Brooklyn
  • Team Falcons

Format

Here is the official format for the Modern Warfare 3 Esports World Cup:

  • Group Stage
    • Four groups of four teams
    • Best of five GSL Format
    • Top two of each group advances
  • Playoffs
    • Best of five Single-elimination
    • Best of seven Grand Final

Matches are played as 5v5s, featuring three different game modes.

All Participating Game Modes:

  • Hardpoint
  • Search and Destroy
  • Control

Among these three game modes are multiple maps that will be played during the tournament.

All Participating Maps:

  • 6 Star
  • Karachi
  • Highrise
  • Rio
  • Invasion
  • Sub Base
  • Vista

Groups

Here is every group, consisting of four teams each, that will compete during the Group Stage matches.

Group A:

  • Carolina Royal Ravens
  • Las Vegas Legion
  • OMiT Brooklyn
  • OpTic Gaming

Group B:

  • Cloud9
  • G2 Esports
  • Gentle Mates
  • Seattle Surge

Group C:

  • Boston Breach
  • Stallions
  • Team Heretics
  • Toronto Ultra

Group D:

  • 100 Thieves
  • Atlanta FaZe
  • Lore Gaming
  • Team Falcons

We will keep you updated at Insider Gaming as more information about the tournament unfolds.

item.title: Black Ops 6 Multiplayer Images and Details Have Started to Leak Online
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/black-ops-6-multiplayer-leaks/

New details and images of Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 have started to leak online ahead of the mode‚Äôs official reveal.

The leaks come courtesy of Twitter user @betterthanalaix, who‚Äôs seemingly been able to gain backend access to Black Ops 6 ahead of the multiplayer BETA and final release.

As of the time of writing, the Twitter account has already leaked all of Black Ops 6‚Äôs 20 multiplayer maps, in addition to details on Gunsmith, killstreaks, perks, weapons and more. We‚Äôll have a full compiled list on all of the details later today.

You can see the leaked images/gameplay below:

It‚Äôs not entirely clear how the user gained access to the game, but judging from the material leaking online, the nature of the screenshots suggests that they were able to access the game via the COD HQ or an old build. At the time of writing, though, this is the only account that has seemingly got access.

The leaks come ahead of CODNext, which is scheduled to take place on August 28th, 2024. CODNext will feature multiplayer reveals ahead of the game‚Äôs multiplayer BETA. In addition, it‚Äôs also been confirmed that CODNext will feature Call of Duty zombies, but as reported previously by Insider Gaming, Warzone may not be there due to Verdansk not returning until Spring 2025.

For the first time, Call of Duty Black Ops 6 will be available on day one on Xbox Game Pass, thanks to Microsoft‚Äôs acquisition of Activision Blizzard.

What do you think of Call of Duty Black Ops 6 so far? Let us know in the comments below!

For more Call of Duty news, check out the news that Activision recently banned 65,000 Call of Duty cheaters in just one week.

item.title: All 20 Black Ops 6 Multiplayer Maps Have Leaked Online
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/black-ops-6-mutliplayer-maps-leaked/

A Black Ops 6 multiplayer map list has leaked online detailing all 20 multiplayer maps that might be coming to the game.

The leaks come courtesy of Twitter user @betterthanalaix, who‚Äôs seemingly been able to gain backend access to Black Ops 6 ahead of the multiplayer BETA and final release.

According to the Twitter/X user, here are 20 maps that will be coming to Black Ops 6.

  • Vorkuta Mine
  • Vorkuta
  • Catacomb
  • Flat
  • Dig
  • Babylon
  • Train Graveyard
  • Russian Base
  • Socotra 2
  • Hacienda alt
  • Strip mall
  • Red Card
  • Firing Range 2
  • Veiled
  • Canals
  • Island
  • Pillage
  • Radar
  • Stealth
  • Nuketown

As those familiar with past Call of Duty titles may recognize, some maps are seemingly from the original Call of Duty: Black Ops title, but most of them seem original.

The Twitter account has also begun to individual upload images of all the Black Ops 6 maps.

Black Ops 6 will launch on the Xbox Series S|X, Xbox One, PlayStation 4, PlayStation5, and PC on October 25, 2024.

What do you think of the leaked Black Ops 6 multiplayer map list? Let us know in the comments below!

For more Insider Gaming coverage, check out the news about Avowed‚Äôs delay

item.title: All GTA 5 Cheat Codes: GTA V Cheats Codes for PS4, PS5, Xbox, and PC
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/gta-5-all-cheat-codes/

GTA 5 might be over 10 years old, but it‚Äôs never too late to have a little fun. In this guide, we‚Äôll be showing you all the GTA 5 cheat codes for all platforms. These cheat codes are the the PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series S|X, and PC.

GTA 5 PS4 & PS5 Cheat Codes

  • Invincibility: RIGHT, X, RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT, R1, RIGHT, LEFT, X, TRIANGLE
  • Max Health and Armor: CIRCLE, L1, TRIANGLE, R2, X, SQUARE, CIRCLE, RIGHT, SQUARE, L1, L1, L1
  • Give Weapons: TRIANGLE, R2, LEFT, L1, X, RIGHT, TRIANGLE, DOWN, SQUARE, L1, L1, L1
  • Super Jump: LEFT, LEFT, TRIANGLE, TRIANGLE, RIGHT, RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT, SQUARE, R1, R2
  • Moon Gravity: LEFT, LEFT, L1, R1, L1, RIGHT, LEFT, L1, LEFT
  • Raise Wanted Level: R1, R1, CIRCLE, R2, LEFT, RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT
  • Lower Wanted Level: R1, R1, CIRCLE, R2, RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT, LEFT
  • Fast Run: TRIANGLE, LEFT, RIGHT, RIGHT, L2, L1, SQUARE
  • Fast Swim: LEFT, LEFT, L1, RIGHT, RIGHT, R2, LEFT, L2, RIGHT
  • Recharge Ability: X, X, SQUARE, R1, L1, X, RIGHT, LEFT, X
  • Give Parachute: LEFT, RIGHT, L1, L2, R1, R2, R2, LEFT, LEFT, RIGHT, L1
  • Explosive Melee Attacks: RIGHT, LEFT, X, TRIANGLE, R1, CIRCLE, CIRCLE, CIRCLE, L2
  • Bang Bang (Explosive Bullets): RIGHT, SQUARE, X, LEFT, R1, R2, LEFT, RIGHT, RIGHT, L1, L1, L1
  • Flaming Bullets: L1, R1, SQUARE, R1, LEFT, R2, R1, LEFT, SQUARE, RIGHT, L1, L1
  • Slow Motion Aim: SQUARE, L2, R1, TRIANGLE, LEFT, SQUARE, L2, RIGHT, X
  • Drunk Mode: TRIANGLE, RIGHT, RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT, SQUARE, CIRCLE, LEFT
  • Slidey Cars: TRIANGLE, R1, R1, LEFT, R1, L1, R2, L1
  • Slow Motion: TRIANGLE, LEFT, RIGHT, RIGHT, SQUARE, R2, R1

GTA V PS5 & PS5 Vehicle Cheat Codes

  • Spawn Buzzard Attack Helicopter: CIRCLE, CIRCLE, L1, CIRCLE, CIRCLE, CIRCLE, L1, L2, R1, TRIANGLE, CIRCLE, TRIANGLE
  • Spawn Comet: R1, CIRCLE, R2, RIGHT, L1, L2, X, X, SQUARE, R1
  • Spawn Sanchez: CIRCLE, X, L1, CIRCLE, CIRCLE, L1, CIRCLE, R1, R2, L2, L1, L1
  • Spawn Trashmaster: CIRCLE, R1, CIRCLE, R1, LEFT, LEFT, R1, L1, CIRCLE, RIGHT
  • Spawn Limo: R2, RIGHT, L2, LEFT, LEFT, R1, L1, CIRCLE, RIGHT
  • Spawn Stunt Plane: CIRCLE, RIGHT, L1, L2, LEFT, R1, L1, L1, LEFT, LEFT, X, TRIANGLE
  • Spawn Caddy: CIRCLE, L1, LEFT, R1, L2, X, R1, L1, CIRCLE, X
  • Spawn Rapid GT: R2, L1, CIRCLE, RIGHT, L1, R1, RIGHT, LEFT, CIRCLE, R2
  • Spawn Duster: RIGHT, LEFT, R1, R1, R1, LEFT, TRIANGLE, TRIANGLE, X, CIRCLE, L1, L1
  • Spawn PCJ-600: MotorcycleR1, RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT, R2, LEFT, RIGHT, SQUARE, RIGHT, L2, L1, L1
  • Spawn BMX: LEFT, LEFT, RIGHT, RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT, SQUARE, CIRCLE, TRIANGLE, R1, R2

GTA 5 PC Cheat Codes

On the PC, you enter your cheat code by entering a code directly on your mobile phone while you‚Äôre playing or via your console. To open the console, press ‚Äú¬≤‚Äù at the top left of your keyboard before typing the following messages.

  • PAINKILLER ‚Äì Makes you immortal
  • TURTLE ‚Äì Recharges health and armour
  • FUGITIVE ‚Äì Increases search level
  • LAWYERUP ‚Äì Reduces search level
  • POWERUP ‚Äì Recharges special ability
  • LIQUOR ‚Äì Drunk mode
  • SLOWMO ‚Äì Slow motion mode
  • DEADEYE ‚Äì Slow-motion aiming
  • CATCHME ‚Äì Fast running
  • GOTGILLS ‚Äì Fast swim
  • HOPTOIT ‚Äì Super jump
  • SKYDIVE ‚Äì Grants a parachute
  • SKYFALL ‚Äì Glides through the sky
  • FLOATER ‚Äì Changes gravity
  • MAKEITRAIN ‚Äì Changes the weather
  • SNOWDAY ‚Äì Skidding vehicles
  • HOTHANDS ‚Äì Explosive punches
  • HIGHEX ‚Äì Explosive ammunition
  • FIRE ‚Äì Incendiary bullets
  • TOOLUP ‚Äì Gives you all the weapons in the game

GTA V PC Vehicle Cheat Codes

  • BANDIT ‚Äì BMX bike
  • BARNSTORM ‚Äì Aerobatic plane
  • BUZZOFF ‚Äì Buzzard attack helicopter
  • COMET ‚Äì Sports car
  • FLYSPRAY ‚Äì Duster aeroplane
  • OFFROAD ‚Äì Sanchez motorbike
  • RAPIDGT ‚Äì Rapid GT car
  • ROCKET ‚Äì PCJ-600 motorbike
  • TRASHED ‚Äì Refuse truck
  • VINEWOOD ‚Äì Limousine
  • DEATHCAR ‚Äì Duke O‚ÄôDeath car (after the Duel challenge)
  • EXTINCT ‚Äì Seaplane (after the Seaplane challenge)
  • BUBBLES ‚Äì Kraken Submarine (after the Wildlife Photography challenge)

GTA 5 Xbox One & Xbox Series S|X Cheat Codes

  • Invincibility: RIGHT, A, RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT, RB, RIGHT, LEFT, A, Y
  • Max Health and Armor: B, LB, Y, RT, A, X, B, RIGHT, X, LB, LB, LB
  • Raise Wanted Level: RB, RB, B, RT, LEFT, RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT
  • Lower Wanted Level: RB, RB, B, RT, RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT, LEFT
  • Fast Run: Y, LEFT, RIGHT, RIGHT, LT, LB, X
  • Fast Swim: LEFT LEFT LB RIGHT RIGHT RT LEFT LT RIGHT
  • Recharge Ability: A, A, X, RB, LB, A, RIGHT, LEFT, A
  • Give Parachute: LEFT, RIGHT, LB, LT, RB, RT, RT, LEFT, LEFT, RIGHT, LB
  • Skyfall: LB, LT, RB, RT, LEFT, RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT, LB, LT, RB, RT, LEFT, RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT
  • Explosive Melee: RIGHT, LEFT, A, Y, RB, B, B, B, LT
  • Explosive Bullets: RIGHT, X, A, LEFT, RB, RT, LEFT, RIGHT, RIGHT, LB, LB, LB
  • Flaming Bullets: LB, RB, X, RB, LEFT, RT, RB, LEFT, X, RIGHT, LB, LB
  • Slow Motion Aim: X, LT, RB, Y, LEFT, X, LT, RIGHT, A
  • Drunk Mode: Y, RIGHT, RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT, X, B, LEFT
  • Weapons: Y, RT, LEFT, LB, A, RIGHT, Y, DOWN, X, LB, LB, LB
  • Super Jump: LEFT, LEFT, Y, Y, RIGHT, RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT, X, RB, RT
  • Moon Gravity: LEFT, LEFT, LB, RB, LB, RIGHT, LEFT, LB, LEFT
  • Change Weather: RT, A, LB, LB, LT, LT, LT, X
  • Slidey Cars: Y, RB, RB, LEFT, RB, LB, RT, LB
  • Slow Motion: Y, LEFT, RIGHT, RIGHT, X, RT, RB

GTA V Xbox One & Xbox Series X|S Vehicle Cheat Codes

  • Spawn Buzzard: B, B, LB, B, B, B, LB, LT, RB, Y, B, Y
  • Spawn Comet: RB, B, RT, RIGHT, LB, LT, A, A, X, RB
  • Spawn Sanchez: B, A, LB, B, B, LB, B, RB, RT, LT, LB, LB
  • Spawn Trashmaster: B, RB, B, RB, LEFT, LEFT, RB, LB, B, RIGHT
  • Spawn Limo: RT, RIGHT, LT, LEFT, LEFT, RB, LB, B, RIGHT
  • Spawn Stunt Plane: B, RIGHT, LB, LT, LEFT, RB, LB, LB, LEFT, LEFT, A, Y
  • Spawn Caddy: B, LB, LEFT, RB, LT, A, RB, LB, B, A
  • Spawn Rapid GT: RT, LB, B, RIGHT, LB, RB, RIGHT, LEFT, B, RT
  • Spawn Duster: RIGHT, LEFT, RB, RB, RB, LEFT, Y, Y, A, B, LB, LB
  • Spawn PCJ‚Äì600: RB, RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT, RT, LEFT, RIGHT, X, RIGHT, LT, LB, LB
  • Spawn BMX: LEFT, LEFT, RIGHT, RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT, X, B, Y, RB, RT

GTA V All Phone Cheat Codes

You can also input a universal cheat codes (which works on all systems) via the in-game phone to make things easier.

  • GTA 5 Max Health and Armor ‚Äì 1-999-887-853 [1-999-TURTLE]
  • Weapons and ammo cheat ‚Äì 1-999-866-587 [1-999-TOOLUP]
  • Raise Wanted Level ‚Äì 1-999-3844-8483 [1-999-FUGITIVE]
  • Lower Wanted Level ‚Äì 1-999-5299-3787 [1-999-LAWYERUP]
  • Parachute cheat ‚Äì 1-999-866-587 [1-999-TOOLUP]

This has been an Insider Gaming guide on all GTA 5 Cheat Codes. Did you find this GTA 5 guide helpful? Please let us know down in the comments below!

For more Insider Gaming coverage, check out the breakdown about Bungie‚Äôs Payback

item.title: Zenless Zone Zero version 1.1 update ‚ÄòUndercover R&B‚Äô launches August 14
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/08/zenless-zone-zero-version-1-1-update-undercover-rb-launches-august-14
  • PC
  • PS5
  • Smartphone

New chapter features Qingyi, Jane, and Seth.

The version 1.1 update for Zenless Zone Zero, dubbed ‚ÄúUndercover R&B,‚Äù will launch on August 14, developer miHoYo announced.

Here is an overview of the update, via miHoYo:

Version 1.1 will feature the new challenges soon to be faced by New Eridu Public Security (N.E.P.S.) and the complex story between Qingyi, Jane, Seth, and the criminal syndicate known as the Mountain Lion Gang. Aside from updates to the story and new characters, Version 1.1 will also introduce the new Hollow Zero gameplay experience ‚ÄúInferno Reap,‚Äù where players can jump into battle with Nineveh directly. Also, the New Eridu Public Security area at Lumina Square will be open to players. Furthermore, with various events such as Camellia Golden Week, abundant rewards are awaiting inquisitive Proxies.

In Version 1.1, Zhu Yuan, Qingyi, and Seth will utilize their talents to fight a battle of wits and courage with the Mountain Lion Gang. However, these criminals always manage to escape arrest with the help of the enigmatic Jane. By further immersing themselves in the world of Special Episode ‚ÄúUndercover R&B‚Äù, Proxies will be able to stroll around New Eridu, complete commissions as Jane, and uncover the intricate past between her and N.E.P.S..

As Proxies become more familiar with New Eridu Public Security (N.E.P.S.), Qingyi will be ready to join players‚Äô squads. As an S-Rank Electric Stun character who can fit in a variety of different squads, Qingyi is skilled at inflicting Daze quickly to stun enemies. While Qingyi‚Äôs attack causes electric damage, she can build up ‚ÄúFlash Connect Voltage,‚Äù triggering a powerful attack once it reaches a certain level. Being Zhu Yuan‚Äôs trustworthy partner at N.E.P.S., Qingyi can also offer significant support to Zhu Yuan in combat.

  • ‚ùÆ
  • ‚ùØ

Assuming a crucial role in Version 1.1‚Äôs storyline, Jane‚Äôs relationship with the player will be that of both friend and foe. As an S-Rank Physical Anomaly Agent, Jane can trigger ‚ÄúPassion State‚Äù by building up Passion Stream, unleashing rapid, multi-stage, and deadly attacks while quickly inflicting Attribute Anomaly on enemies. However, before she joins the players‚Äô squads, Proxies will face Jane as an enemy in combat due to her status as an important member of the Mountain Lion Gang. You can certainly count on her agile combat skills, but you might not feel the same when you are on the receiving end.

Beyond two S-Rank characters, the A-Rank Electric Defense character Seth is also ready to join combat. Aside from buffing his teammates with a shield, Seth‚Äôs weapon can also transform into a large sword he uses to defeat enemies. In addition, new S-Rank Bangboo ‚ÄúOfficer Cui‚Äù will be able to assist Proxies in the Hollows.

In addition to regular updates to Shiyu Defense, Zenless Zone Zero is introducing new gameplay ‚ÄúInferno Reap‚Äù to Hollow Zero. After completing the ‚ÄúWithering Garden‚Äù stage and related commissions, Proxies can enter a time-limited battle with Nineveh. The challenge can be attempted as many times as possible. Successful challenges grant a wide range of in-game rewards.

In Version 1.1‚Äôs themed event ‚ÄúCamellia Golden Week‚Äù, Proxies can obtain Polychromes, A-level W-engine, and various materials by completing event commissions. Additionally, a variety of new in-game events and features such as Immersive Tactical Drill, First-Class Customer Service, and upgraded camera function with filters and selfie options will offer players fun new ways to enjoy the game!

Zenless Zone Zero is available now for for PlayStation 5 via PlayStation Store, PC via client download and Epic Games Store, iOS via App Store, and Android via Google Play

Watch the version 1.1 trailer and special program below. View a new set of screenshots at the gallery.

item.title: Silent Hill: The Short Message has been downloaded 3m times
item.content:encoded:
https://www.eurogamer.net/silent-hill-the-short-message-has-been-downloaded-3m-times

Silent Hill: The Short Message ‚Äì a two-hour free-to-play first-person horror shadow-dropped by Konami earlier this year ‚Äì has been downloaded over three million times.

Konami marked the occasion on social media, inviting players yet to meet Anita to "please give it a try".

"In an abandoned apartment building where strange phenomena occur one after another, can you escape from the grotesque creatures?" the publisher teased (machine-translation provided by Google Translate).

"It's available for free on PlayStation 5. Please give it a try."

To see this content please enable targeting cookies.

"I suspect that anyone who can relate to Anita's fictional experiences from a real-life perspective will have one of two polarising responses to Silent Hill: The Short Message: deep outrage, or deep admiration," I wrote in my Silent Hill: The Short Message review, giving it three out of five stars.

"No, it may not be the Silent Hill game many of us were expecting; it may not even be the Silent Hill game some people want. But even with that infuriating chase sequence, I'm very glad it exists."

In related Silent Hill news, Silent Hill 2's original creators "didn't want to make the same thing again" when it came to Silent Hill 2 Remake, causing Remake developer Bloober Team to push back on some of their more outlandish suggestions.

Silent Hill: The Short Message developer Hexadrive also recently announced it's developing a new horror game, Niraya of ‚ñ†‚ñ†.

item.title: Final Fantasy 14 mobile game is approved in China
item.content:encoded:
https://www.eurogamer.net/final-fantasy-14-mobile-game-is-approved-in-china

Other games include Rainbow Six Mobile, Dynasty Warriors, and Marvel Rivals.

China has approved a number of new mobile games for release, most notably Marvel Rivals, Rainbow Six, Dynasty Warriors, and Final Fantasy 14 Mobile.

According to Niko Partners, a total of 15 games were approved yesterday (2nd August), including the still-as-yet-unconfirmed Final Fantasy 14 mobile port.

The news adds credence to a recent rumour that Final Fantasy developer Square Enix had linked up with Tencent to develop a mobile version of its fan-favourite MMO, Final Fantasy 14.

To see this content please enable targeting cookies.

The approval of Rainbow Six Mobile is interesting, too. Rainbow Six Siege has never been approved by the Chinese authorities, and its ban extended to livestreams as well as sales.

Tencent is reportedly publishing both the Rainbow Six and Final Fantasy 14 games, whilst NetEase secured licenses for Marvel Snap and Marvel Rivals.

Talking of Final Fantasy 14, director and producer Naoki "Yoshi P" Yoshida recently offered his "sincere apologies" for the issues identified in the early access build of its highly-anticipated expansion, Dawntrail.

In a blog post published shortly after the expansion went live for early access players, Yoshida thanked players for playing and assured them that the team was "investigating" the causes of the most pressing issues, including transition freezes on Xbox, and broken animations across all platforms.

Don't forget that from now until 28th August, Final Fantasy fans can enjoy three FF14-inspired teas at participating outlets of Gong Cha, as well as earn "special rewards, including the adorable Porxie King mount".
